Articles.Content:
Sector 7 Space Laboratories VTOL Division - Minuscule

 

 





Craft Assembly: Probodobodyne RoveMate, Monopropellant Tanks, 0-10 Puff Engines, Basic Fins, Small inline Reaction Wheel.

Parts: 45
Mass: 4.8t

Size:
Height: 1.8m
Width: 2.2m
Length: 3.0m

Flight Operations:
Engage RCS and SAS, then press spacebar and have fun!


Craft File

Edited January 14, 2016 by castille7

Cute! :D You'll be able to get a bit more range/performance by angling the engines straight down. Just so you know the Puff engines also have pretty poor athmo performance and so may not be the best choice for bombing round KSC. :P

Cupcake...

[quote name='Cupcake...']Cute! :D You'll be able to get a bit more range/performance by angling the engines straight down. Just so you know the Puff engines also have pretty poor athmo performance and so may not be the best choice for bombing round KSC. :P

Cupcake...[/QUOTE]

Thank you for the pointer, I didn't know this, I will tweak the craft and give it a try!
